title: Factorial
algorithmDescription: Calculate n! (factorial) using iterative approach with a loop
detailedDescription: Write a program that reads an integer n and calculates n! (n factorial). Factorial of n is the product of all positive integers from 1 to n. Use iterative approach with a loop.
hints: Multiply result by each number in the loop
commonMistakes: Starting loop from 0 (causes result to become 0)
solutionApproach: Initialize result=1, loop from i=1 to n, multiply result *= i each iteration, output result.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly calculate factorial for n=0 (output 1) to reasonable values like n=10 (output 3628800)
